title: Comparison of renal function of patients after tumor nephrectomy versus donor nephrectomy: Long term outcome using a propensity score matching analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Pongsatorn Laksanabunsong, Thitipat Hansomwong, Chalairat Suk-ouichai, Varat Woranisarakul, Siros Jitpraphai, Ekkarin Chotikawanich, Tawatchai Taweemonkongsap
